```
    from microdot import Microdot

    app = Microdot()

    @app.get('/')
    async def index(request):
        return {'hello': 'world'}

    app.run(debug=True)

```

```
    def create_app():
        app = Microdot()
        app.mount(customers_app, url_prefix='/customers')
        app.mount(orders_app, url_prefix='/orders')
        return app
```
